## Dictionary

```{r}
NUM <- 1000
EXAMPLE <- data.frame(Belief=factor(x=sample(c("Yes","No"),NUM,TRUE),levels=c("Yes","No"),labels=c("Y","N")),
                      PH=factor(x=sample(c("Yes","No"),NUM,TRUE),levels=c("Yes","No"),labels=c("Y","N")),
                      MH=factor(x=sample(c("Yes","No"),NUM,TRUE),levels=c("Yes","No"),labels=c("Y","N")),
                      Region=factor(x=sample(c("A","B","H","P","K","Q","C","G","E","P","H"),NUM,TRUE))
)


```
